title.rendered: SSHS Students Celebrated at CTE Signing Day

content.rendered:
The WSWHE BOCES Career and Technical Education (CTE) program held a CTE Signing Day to recognize students in its programs who will go directly into the workforce. Congratulations to the following Saratoga Springs High School students who participated.

  • Troye Douglas – Pompa Brothers
  • Jared Jennings – Town of Greenfield
  • Joseph McPadden – Matt McPadden Builders
  • Justin Miller – BDP Industries
  • Benjamin Senecal – Bonacio Construction
  • Ella Trahan – Melanie Smith
